message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $70.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $60 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $68.
